promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic strong swan psychic-type pokemon wearing a regal crown. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or swan. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Majestiquill, a a gigantic strong swan psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Reflect Energy. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "swan", "psychic" or "Majestiquill". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, swan-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: With an impressive stature, Majestiquill illuminates cavern sanctuaries. It projects energy barriers and channels ethereal forces.
